reviews.review_text: Fairly short game, one of those times where I'd neither recommend it or otherwise, but negative seems more appropriate.  Pros:  -Nice, simple design -Some challenging puzzles -Only .99 USD   Cons:  -Very short -No saves (Claims it's too short to do that) -Very repetitive music (Restarts upon level start, level restart..) -Blocks falling in front and behind the platform, even though it's a flat game (Maybe they could implement that in a BitRay2, 3d!)  Overall, an okay game for on sale / obtained in a bundle, or blowing a buck on a little challenge.

This is a fun little game. It's sort of like reverse Jenga, where you have to leave only a certain block. To spice things up, some blocks have special functions that chnage the gameplay. Although it has no save feature, the game only takes about 30 minutes to complete. Quick and easy fun when bored.
This game is simple and calming but takes some stratagy. Get the game yourself it is worth it :D
